entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
